short_summary: Cisco or Equivalent for the Department of National Defence
description: Cisco or Equivalent for the Department of National Defence. SSC CISCO or Equivalent for the Department of National Defence- Amendment 001
full_summary:
================[]
### Request for Proposal (RFP) for CISCO Equipment

### Brief Description
The Shared Services Canada is seeking Proposals for CISCO or Equivalent Equipment for the Department of National Defence.

### Important Details

#### Tender Information

- **Tender Reference**: SSC-23-00021793:T
- **Tender Number**: BPM018148/21793
- **Release Date**: February 2023
- **Closing Date**: February 16, 2023, at 14:00 (Eastern Time)
- **Contract Term**: Not specified

#### Category and Category Description

- **Category**: Goods and Services
- **Description**: ADP Central Processing Unit (CPU, Computer) Digital, ADP Software

#### Trade Agreements

- **Trade Agreements**: The RFP adheres to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Regions

- **Primary Region**: Canada (excluding National Capital Region)
- **Delivery Address**: Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)

#### Contact Information

- **Point of Contact**: Eleanor Cesare
- **Email**: [eleanor.cesare@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:eleanor.cesare@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
- **Phone**: 613 219-8366
- **Fax**: 613 960-6026

#### Attachments

Access the RFP documents via the following links:

* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/555D938A-96BC-4730-A8B8-257DDE478983
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/D250DC3E-26C1-4D94-B59D-C36538D2107D
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/9E9E0FF5-ED3A-4626-BB9A-65EE71E08BD8
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/300B0727-F829-4AD1-BB4C-B94E16876582

### Notice
The RFP is now expired. Unfortunately, it is no longer possible to submit a response. Due to the closure of this invitation, interested parties are encouraged to search for active RFPs that match their requirements. [^1]
